column6: TAKEN FOR A RIDE: Peter Parker makes a "date" with the new girl at school, then realizes a major missing component: A car. Luckily, he's a got a friend of a friend that loans rides for cheap. But when Pete discovers the cars are cheap because they've been stolen, it's a little late...some of the cars belonged to some bad guys...guys that don't mind hurting teenagers... Join Tobin, Lolli, and Young as Pete's brand-new Adventures continue!  All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | penciller:Matteo Lolli | penciller:Skottie Young | letterer:Dave Sharpe | colorist:Chris Sotomayor | writer:Paul Tobin | inker:Christian Dalla Vecchia
